title: Executive Order 5868-Reservoir-Site Restoration No. 11, California
content: So much of the order of June 8, 1926, creating Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 17, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 2 S., R. 15 E., sec. 20, S. ½ SW. ¼, SW. ¼ SE. ¼;
sec. 30, N. ½ NE. ¼ SE. ¼ NE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5868-Reservoir-Site Restoration No. 11, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361461
